title: Duck a l’orange
description: There’s a reason this retro recipe is a classic - it’s delish. Try it with Hassleback potatoes and seasonal veg.
ingredients: 2 tsp flaked sea salt, plus extra to season
½ onion, cut into four wedges
½ onion, peeled and thinly sliced
4 tbsp orange liqueur, such as Cointreau
1½ large oranges, freshly squeezed juice only (around 150ml/5fl oz)
2 tsp cornflour (if you want a thinner sauce only use 1 tsp)
